{"id":432091202,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 4 months","timestamp":1608329723,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"128 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/432091202/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum","memory":"20.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<vector<int>> threeSum(vector<int>& nums) {\n        sort(nums.begin(), nums.end());\n        vector<vector<int>> ans;\n        int n = nums.size();\n        for (int i = 0; i < nums.size(); ++i) {\n            if (i != 0 && nums[i - 1] == nums[i]) continue;\n            \n            int j = i + 1;\n            int k = n - 1;\n            while(j < k) {\n                if (j != i + 1 && nums[j] == nums[i + 1]) {\n                    ++j;\n                } else if (k != n - 1 && nums[k] == nums[k + 1]) {\n                    --k;\n                } else if (nums[k] + nums[j] + nums[i] > 0) {\n                    --k;\n                } else if (nums[k] + nums[j] + nums[i] < 0) {\n                    ++j;\n                } else {\n                    ans.push_back(vector<int>{nums[i], nums[j++], nums[k--]});\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum"}
